ai.name: Natural Language Predictor
ai.desc: Placeholder: One task within this spectrum is Part-Of-Speech (POS) tagging. Every word and punctuation symbol is understood to have a syntactic role in its sentence, such as nouns (denoting people, places or things), verbs (denoting actions), adjectives (which describe nouns) and adverbs (which describe verbs), just to name a few. Each word in a piece of text is therefore associated with a part-of-speech tag (usually assigned by hand), where the total number of tags can depend on the organization tagging the text.

bot.name: Wargroove Damage Discord Bot
bot.desc: Placeholder: Create a discord bot that handles in-game damage calculations that is not offered by the game.hosted on a third-party cloud service. Node.js, discord API, heroku
